mapper.select: select user_id id,phone,password,salt,dharmaName,province,city,gender,personal_sign personalSign,profile,status,regist_time registTime from c_user limit ${(begin-1)*pageSize},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update c_user set status=#{status} where user_id=#{id}
